name: Stolen Eggs
description:
Mercenaries in a large galaxy live at ease, orders are a dime a dozen. Today you have to save an endangered species. Be on the lookout, your spaceship might leave without you. Collect all the eggs that are protected by robots robbers and become a hero.

Stolen Eggs is a Top Down game with beautiful graphics and challenging playthroughs. In the person of a mercenary, you need to save an endangered species, and return the last eggs to their parents. Go around the planets and collect eggs, just be careful, your ship does not always want to wait for the end of the collection. Catch him up and collect the eggs that fall along the way.

Features of the game:
- Beautiful graphics
- Dynamic music
- Many levels
- Complexity
